metadata.description: Re-presenting the first three issues of select titles for $3.00 each, TIMELY COMICS will take you on a path through the restored Marvel Universe after Secret Wars! Whether it’s the formation of the Avengers, Daredevil’s fight for Chinatown, the birth of the Totally Awesome Hulk – TIMELY COMICS has it all and so much more!
metadata.name: Timely Comics
